resources.string: The Bible is a book that is most often stolen in American stores.
U.S. law allowed children to be sent by mail until 1913.
In modern history, there is a period of time when Apple had more funds in its accounts than the American government.
Saudi Arabia does not contain rivers.
There is only one river in Antarctica â€“ Onyx, it flows only 60 days a year.
Lemon contains more sugar than strawberries.
There are only 7% left-handers in the world
The cow can go up the stairs, but she can\'t go down.
The tallest building in Europe is located in Moscow.
There are more stars in the universe than there are grains of sand on all the beaches of the Earth.
The red rag irritates the bull.
Bananas are harvested from palm trees.
Dogs see our world in black and white colors.
Wolves are always howling at the moon.
Pluto is the ninth planet.
Cockroaches can survive a nuclear apocalypse.
Newton discovered the law of universal gravitation after an apple fell on his head.
Sweets improve brain activity.
Tomatoes are vegetables.
The compass needle always points to true north.
